violations.description: More than 1000 people in a single zone at any time.
violations.recommendation: Limit the number of people to less than 1000.

violations.description: Persons should not be nearby unless they have badges of colors green, light blue, dark blue, purple, orange.
violations.recommendation: Ensure that only authorized personnel are present.

violations.description: Flag unattended bags, weapons, or unknown packages.
violations.recommendation: Inspect unattended items for potential security risks.

violations.description: Flag any fighting, running, or aggressive gestures.
violations.recommendation: Implement a zero-tolerance policy for aggressive behavior.

violations.description: All persons in work zones must wear required PPE (hard hat, vest).
violations.recommendation: Ensure that all personnel are wearing the correct PPE.

report.summary: The observation is non-compliant due to a violation of Rule R001 and Rule R02. The risk score indicates a high level of security risk as more than 1000 people are present in the zone.
